sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 playing cards if one card is drawn at random?
message_2: There is only one King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. If one card is drawn at random, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts is 1 out of 52, or 1/52. In decimal form, this is approximately 0.01923, or 1.923% as a percentage.
